entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -29.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -32.7°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
